channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: From setting goals to sticking
item.description: From setting goals to sticking to healthy habits, here’s all that you need to know about #SunielShetty’s diet and fitness.

item.title: #InPics | #WestBengal police d
item.description: #InPics | #WestBengal police detained several #BJP workers who began their protest in Alipurduar to mark the 12-hour "#BanglaBandh" called by the party.

item.title: #ItsViral | Veteran investor #
item.description: #ItsViral | Veteran investor #JimRogers says he learned a lot about gold and silver from Indian markets
